job_description: Azure Data Architect - job post Coderepoz LLC Dallas, TX Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Contract Role: AZURE Data Architect Location: Dallas, TX (3 Days onsite) Long Term Minimum 3-4 years Data Architect Experience Basic Qualifications Overall 13+ years of IT Environment Experience. 5+ years of experience partnering with business managers to develop technical strategies and architectures to support their objectives 5+ years in Azure Data Factory. 4 +azure data bricks, azure cosmos db, multi-factor authentication, event hub, azure active directory, logic apps. 4+ years of hands-on experience with analytics deployment in the cloud (prefer Azure) 5+ years of delivering analytics in modern data architecture (Hadoop, Massively Parallel Processing Database Platforms and Semantic Modeling) Demonstrable knowledge of ETL and ELT patterns and when to use either one; experience selecting among different tools that could be leveraged to accomplish this (Talend, Informatica, Azure Data Factory, SSIS, SAP Data Services) Demonstrable knowledge of and experience with different scripting languages (python, JavaScript, PIG or object-oriented programming like Java or .NET) Design and architect solutions on Microsoft Azure and related technologies including Synapse, ADF, ADLS, ADE, ASA AAS, AML and Power BI Design and Develop Data Ingestion using Synapse, ADF and processing layer using Databricks, Spark Notebooks. Enterprise Architect - job post sourcemantra Dallas, TX 75201 From $80 an hour -  Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary From $80 an hour Job Type Contract About The Job: As an Enterprise Architect in this role, you will work with our client to lead the transformation program delivery and architecture within their business. You will also work cross-functionally to provide pre-business enterprise architecture support, solutions delivery/migration, and engineering expertise. You'll also help inform the scope of services, staffing, and timelines. In addition, you will advise customer on architecture best practices and architectural blueprints as the foundation for migration. As part of the Professional Services and Delivery team, you will work on customer requests for proposal (RFPs) and proposal processes, including partnering with Sales and Delivery counterparts to deliver technical architecture and services strategies. On this team, you'll propose, develop, and implement approaches as well as strive for execution consistency and repeatability for these engagements. In this role, you'll also represent and deliver best practices across the areas of infrastructure, application, data modernization, and more. You will collaborate cross-functionally within the client company and support their internal and service partner community. You will also be advising on migration approaches and work with a diverse set of internal stakeholders. Responsibilities: Recommend and document migration paths, integration strategies, and application architectures required to successfully implement complete solutions using best practices. Collaborate with C-levels and cross functional teams within the organization. Oversee delivery excellence, exceptional customer satisfaction, and accurate estimation of customer outcomes. Work with client looking to move their enterprise IT estate to public/hybrid cloud, including providing enterprise architecture, direction, and recommended professional services to enable digital transformation. Drive the capturing, developing, and sharing of best practices internally and externally to accelerate implementations. Lead the delivery of transformation roadmap. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Math, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 6 years of experience performing customer-facing services focused on translating enterprise customer needs into cloud architectures and approaches. Experience in developing solution architectures through system design techniques. Ability to be on site in Dallas or travel to company headquarters as needed. Preferred qualifications: Experience implementing large-scale cloud or software projects in corporate environments. Experience working with cloud architecture with enterprise use cases. Understanding of modern application migration and modernization approaches. Excellent organizational, analytical, and influencing skills. Job Type: Contract Salary: From $80.00 per hour Schedule: 8 hour shift Work Location: In person Speak with the employer +91 8566660752 If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
